title: Corporate Portal SQLi
description: Test the login mechanism of XYZ Corp's internal portal for SQL Injection vulnerabilities.
hints: Pay attention to how user input is being handled in SQL queries.
Experiment with SQL Injection techniques to bypass authentication.
Consider what happens when the query returns more than one result.
learningObjectives: Understand the implications of SQL Injection vulnerabilities
Learn to exploit SQL Injection to bypass authentication
Practice analyzing and modifying SQL queries dynamically
